mapper.select: SELECT Cart.userId, Cart.productId, Cart.quantity, Cart.sizelabel, Cart.color, ProductColor.imagepath, Brand.name as brandName FROM Cart, ProductColor, Product, Brand WHERE cart.userId = #{usetId} and cart.productId like Product.id and product.brandId = brand.id and cart.productId like ProductColor.productId
mapper.insert: INSERT into Cart(usetId, productId, quantity, color, sizelabel) VALUES(#{usetId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{color}, #{size})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Cart WHERE userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
